scripts.compiletest: pulp build && psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Test.Main --module Test.Main --output runtest.js && java -jar closure-compiler-v20161024.jar --js runtest.js --js_output_file runtestcomp.js -O SIMPLE
scripts.compiletestdev: npm run devpsc && npm run bundledev && java -jar closure-compiler-v20161024.jar --process_common_js_modules --js runtestdev.js --js_output_file runtestdevcomp.js -O ADVANCED
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run setuptestsql && pulp test
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.maketestsql: node sqltopurs.js -i test.sql -o test/Schema.purs -e extra.purs -m MyApp.SQL
scripts.setuptestsql: npm run schema && npm run maketestsql
